statements.insert: insert into device_info (rw_id, device_id, device_name, factory_code, device_sim, device_type, ico_num, belong_groupid, com_mode, install_date, initial_course, engine_number, frame_number, linkphone, plate_color, vehicle_color, is_oil_sensor, is_camera, is_temp_sensor, is_is_relay, device_remark) values (#rw_id#, #device_id#, #device_name#, #factory_code#, #device_sim#, #device_type#, #ico_num#, #belong_groupid#, #com_mode#, #install_date#, #initial_course#, #engine_number#, #frame_number#, #linkphone#, #plate_color#, #vehicle_color#, #is_oil_sensor#, #is_camera#, #is_temp_sensor#, #is_is_relay#, #device_remark#);
